com.squidtopusstudios.zerobitengine.utils.loader.overlap2d

Class Overlap2dLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.squidtopusstudios.zerobitengine.utils.loader.overlap2d.Overlap2dLoader

  • public class Overlap2dLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    Level loader for Overlap2D: http://overlap2d.com/ Based on https://github.com/UnderwaterApps/overlap2d-runtime-libgdx

    • Method Detail

      • loadMap

        public static void loadMap(com.badlogic.gdx.files.FileHandle projectPath,
           com.badlogic.gdx.files.FileHandle scenePath,
           com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureAtlas atlas)
        Loads the specified scene into the World. Entities within the scene are automatically added to the current World's entity list and can be accessed, as normal, using World.entities()
        Parameters:
        scenePath - path to scene.dt to load
        projectPath - path to project.dt to load
        atlas - TextureAtlas used by the scene

      • loadStage

        public static com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Stage loadStage(com.badlogic.gdx.files.FileHandle projectPath,
                                              com.badlogic.gdx.files.FileHandle scenePath,
                                              java.lang.String resolution,
                                              com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureAtlas atlas)
        Loads the specified scene as a LibGDX Stage. Entities within the scene are automatically added to a new Stage instance and can be accessed through it
        Parameters:
        scenePath - path of scene.dt to load
        projectPath - path to project.dt to load
        resolution - Overlap2D resolution option to load
        atlas - TextureAtlas used by the scene
        Returns:
        new Stage instance
